original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 18.1. Hetuduka, Sahetukaduka
analyzed: hetu duka sa hetuka duka

original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Hetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: hetum sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuṁ sahetukañca nahetuṁ sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetum sa hetukam ca na hetum sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe eka adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe pañca pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca

original: Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte cattāri …pe… navippayutte ekaṁ …pe… novigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetuyā eka na ārammaṇe tīṇi na adhipatiyā pañca na purejāte cattāri pe na vippayutte ekam pe no vigate tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

original: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na sa hetukassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na sa hetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ na na hetussa na sa hetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa ca nanahetussa nasahetukassa ca dhammassa
analyzed: hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na sa hetukassa ca na na hetussa na sa hetukassa ca dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ na na hetussa na sa hetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na sa hetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa ca nanahetussa nasahetukassa ca dhammassa
analyzed: na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na sa hetukassa ca na na hetussa na sa hetukassa ca dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo saṅkhitta

original: Hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: hetu sa hetukaḥ ca na hetu sa hetukaḥ ca dhammā na hetussa na sa hetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Hetu sahetuko ca nahetusahetuko ca dhammā nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa
analyzed: paccayaḥ hetu sa hetukaḥ ca na hetu sa hetukaḥ ca dhammā na na hetussa na sa hetukassa dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve, anantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā dve anantare cattāri sahajāte pañca aññamaññe

original: cattāri, nissaye pañca, upanissaye cha, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme …pe…
analyzed: cattāri nissaye pañca upanissaye cha pacchājāte tīṇi āsevane eka kamme pe

original: āhāre tīṇi, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge pañca, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte tīṇi
analyzed: āhāre tīṇi indriye pañca jhāne tīṇi magge pañca sampayutte eka vippayutte tīṇi

original: …pe… avigate pañca. (Pañhāvāraṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: pe avigate pañca pañhāvāram

original: Hetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: hetum ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe cattāri pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cattāri
